About Me

I am an aspiring Software Engineer graduating with a B.S. degree in Computer Science and Engineering from Santa Clara University. I am seeking a full time role upon my graduation in June 2021. I am skilled in C/C++, Java, Python, and SQL, in addition to web technologies such as HTML, CSS, PHP, and JavaScript.

Experience

Pure Storage

Software Automation Intern

Wrote Python programs to pull usage and spend information from application REST API's and put it into an MS SQL database

Designed a SQL Database to hold current values and keep a record of previous entries

Created Tableau dashboard which keeps up to date statistics and analytics in an easy to digest format

Ran project off of a Docker image to contain all package and library dependencies

Santa Clara University

Help Desk Analyst/Field Support Technician

Worked with students, faculty, and staff to help fix technical computer issues, ensure customer devices' compliance with the university’s network policy, and assist in setting up personal computers and school computer labs.

Set up, image, and inventory computers, printers, and other devices, ensuring all new devices are complaint with the university's network policies and are inventoried into the asset database.

Projects

Java Quiz Taking Application

Devleopled an application in a team of 3 written in Java. Students log in and answer quiz questions, and are graded behind the scenes. A teacher can then log in and view scores and analytics on students. The application featured a full UI, data storage, and logic derived from buisness requirements.

View Project

SQL Sales Database and Website

Design the schema for a complex sales database, featuring triggers, constraints, and leveraging PL/SQL scripts. Connected the database to an HTML front end via PHP programs. The website allows a user to sign up, view and place orders, and view the store items.

View Project

Python Motivational Twitterbot

Python program that generates original twitter content based on a giant list of motivational and historical quotes. Program generates sentences via Markov chains, and then overlays the text on a random picture with a random selected text.

View Project

View Twitter Account

C Webserver Programs

Implemented a multithreaded server program in C that can service multiple clients simultaniuously. Also implemented a UDP connection framed as a client server interaction.

View Project

Verilog/Vivado CPU Design and Testbench

Project for my computer architecture class which was a 4 staged pipelined CPU. I created all the subcomponents for a CPU in Verilog and conncted them together, and then simulated the CPU in the Vivado software to debug and confirm functionality.

View Project
